mapper.sql: id, title, description, tag, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, comment_count, view_count, like_count
mapper.insert:
insert into question
title,
description,
tag,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
creator,
comment_count,
view_count,
like_count,
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update question
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
view_count = #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, view_count = #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update question
title = #{updated.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{updated.description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
tag = #{updated.tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{updated.gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
